name: Stock Management Report
query:
SELECT
    sm.name AS "Stock Management ID:Link/Stock Management:150",
    sm.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:120",
    sm.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:150",
    sm.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:100",
    sm.exiting_circuit_id AS "Exiting Circuit ID:Data:120",
    sm.customer_name AS "Customer:Data:150",
    sm.status AS "Status:Data:100",
    sm.disconnection_stage AS "Disconnection Stage:Data:100",
    sm.stock_management_type AS "Stock Management Type:Data:120",
    sm.delivery_requested_date AS "Delivery Requested Date:Date:120",
    sm.solution AS "Solution Name:Data:120",
    sm.solution_code AS "Solution Code:Data:120",
    sm.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:100",
    sm.delivery_note_id AS "Delivery Note ID:Link/Delivery Note:120",

    sm.shipment_id AS "Shipment ID:Data:120",
    sm.tracking_status AS "Tracking Status:Data:100",
    sm.service_provider AS "Service Provider:Data:100",
    sm.carrier_service AS "Carrier Service:Data:100",
    sm.carrier AS "Carrier:Data:100",
    sm.delivery_date AS "Delivery Date:Date:100",
    sm.pickup_date AS "Pickup Date:Date:100",
    sm.awb_number AS "AWB Number:Data:100",

    smi.item_code AS "Item Code:Data:120",
    smi.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:120",
    smi.qty AS "Quantity:Int:80",
    smi.bulk_serial_no AS "Bulk Serial No:Data:120",
    smi.item_group AS "Item Group:Data:120",
    smi.delivery_note_id AS "Item Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:120",
    smi.deliver_date AS "Item Delivery Date:Date:100",
    smi.sim_no AS "SIM No:Data:120",
    smi.data_plan AS "Data Plan:Data:120",
    smi.mobile_no AS "Mobile No:Data:120",
    smi.supplier AS "Supplier:Data:120",
    smi.serial_no AS "Serial No:Data:120",
    smi.imei AS "IMEI:Data:120",

    DATEDIFF(sm.pickup_date, sm.delivery_requested_date) AS "Material Ageing (Days):Int:100",
    DATEDIFF(sm.delivery_date, sm.pickup_date) AS "Shipment Ageing (Days):Int:100"

FROM
    `tabStock Management` sm
LEFT JOIN
    `tabStock Management Item` smi ON smi.parent = sm.name
WHERE
    sm.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    sm.creation DESC
